entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] GC suspension issues with System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #70115
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes in exception clauses #70109
  • [System.Text.Json] DeserializeAsyncEnumerable is delayed emitting objects when writing asynchronously to stream #70107
  • Should we have the Convert class support the newly introduced numeric types? #70104
  • JIT: cloning invariant analysis seems oddly limited #70100
  • native-managed HResult incompatibility #70099
  • HttpConnectionPool contention for HTTP/1.1 #70098
  • Build: generate layout does not copy runtime libraries #70096
  • [Native AOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1102: out of memory and Failed to load type #70092
  • TypedReference.ToObject tests failing on Mono #70091
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Quic connection keep alive #70090
  • [wasm] Split initial implementation draft PR #70085
  • Test Infrastructure Failure: System.IO.IOException: Unknown error 42424 #70079
  • WebProxy - UseDefaultCredentials - Set to false overwrites credentials #70083
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure intrinsic should make sure the ctor is reflectable #70072
    7.0.0
  • Fix GS cookie support #70071
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MayIgnoreAttribute to enlighten IDE0058 #70064
  • Test failure System.Threading.Channels.Tests.SyncMultiReaderUnboundedChannelTests.ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_Success(numReaders: 10, numWriters: 1) #70061
  • Test failure System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File(format: Pax) #70060
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Implement mono support for default interface implementations of static virtual methods #70040
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests on coreclr/linux/arm64/debug #70112
  • Test failure System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.CallStackFrame_AggressiveInlining #69835
    7.0.0
  • Stale error message: COR_E_LOADING_REFERENCE_ASSEMBLY #70074
  • [wasm] Stack overflow in `JIT/Directed/tailcall/tailcall/tailcall.sh` on Linux #69517
    7.0.0
  • Can't debug C native dependency of WASM Blazor #69599
    7.0.0
  • Sha512ManagedTests.Sha512_Fips180_3_Async is flaky #70058
  • Prefer Dictionary<K, V>.TryGetValue() over guarded indexer access #33798
    7.0.0
  • How can I declare an interop COM interface as "agile"? #69979
  • [API Proposal]: Let the application author tell us to be idle. #66037
    7.0.0
  • Support arrays in `mono_reflection_create_custom_attr_data_args_noalloc` #52977
    7.0.0
  • Unresolved CppInlinenamespaceAttribute when linking.. #70077
  • StopTheHostException should be made public to be dealt with gracefully #60600
    7.0.0
  • [Mono][Android][Interp] Missing dll - Could not load file or assembly 'xunit.performance.core, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=67066efe964d3b03' or one of its dependencies. #55528
    Future
  • What was the reason to inject DispatchTailCalls method after profiler instrumentation in .NET 7.0? #70013
    7.0.0
  • Missing docker image `fedora-34-helix-20220523150939-4f64125` in mcr #70005
  • Test failure System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.GetHostAddressesTest_Cancellation.DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #69993
  • NativeAOT does not respect STAThreadAttribute/MTAThreadAttribute on main entry point #70066
    7.0.0
  • In Debug HttpUtility.UrlDecode double-decodes while WebUtility.UrlDecode does not. #70018
  • Infinite recursion in System.Private.CoreLib #53833
    Future
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #69653
    7.0.0
  • ARM32/ARM64 gcstress-extra failures #69657
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Reflection.Tests timeout/hang #69476
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetTotalPauseDuration/GetTotalPauseDuration.sh #69662

PullRequests

Created

  • fix InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo by retrying on 0 values #70119
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Enabling System.Threading tests for NativeAOT #70118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use key properties to determine ECC key size for Apple #70116
    area-System.Security
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection
  • Exempt MemberNotNullWhen from genapi ref assembly requirements #70113
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
  • Add exception interop test for validating native exception interop on Windows + CoreCLR. #70110
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Update test to stop expecting removed diagnostics #70106
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thinks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70103
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Disable flaky DNS cancellation tests during jitstress #70089
    area-System.Net
  • Don't explicitly link ICU into Mono on FreeBSD #70088
    area-Build-mono
  • Update Roslyn to pick up recent features / bug fixes / design changes #70087
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • Improve DisplayNameHelpers for NativeAOT #70084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Tag dotnet/jit-contrib on area-CodeGen-coreclr issues #70076
    area-Meta
  • JIT ARM32: Fix passing odd sized structs from arbitrary sources #70075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Enable test that already fixed #70065
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable -Werror=shorten-64-to-32 #70062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Host error message updates #70059
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x

Merged

  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Revert "[mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter (#68823)" #69866
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Make gcunsafe for cpblk if it has gc pointers #70069
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid tailcall optimization in invoke test #70108
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Move docs about building different form factors to the top #70102
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Make gcunsafe for cpblk if it has gc pointers #70053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix state reference of reflection-only loader context #70094
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix runtime test failing due to the app running in debug mode #70050
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70093
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Android][test] Enable mandelbrot-7 on Android x64 with interp #69915
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix flakyness of DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #70044
    area-System.Net
  • Fix STAThreadAttribute/MTAThreadAttribute on main entry point not respected by NativeAOT #70067
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure we do not corrupt RAX for CFG dispatcher on x64 #70016
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix fgCanTailCallViaJitHelper #70033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect docker tack for fedora 34 helix image #70011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ILogWriter interface to ilc and crossgen #69609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT info to dump debugging template #70070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix compilation error in VS 17.3.1 #69994
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use void* for array pinning #70048
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Exclude GetTotalPauseDuration from GCStress #70037
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Move Format property to TarEntry and allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries #69933
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #70034
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support more primitive type converters #70057
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Move TypeReference.ToObject to managed (CoreCLR) #70055
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    breaking-change, area-Setup, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Decouple TimeOnlyConverter from TimeSpanConverter #70035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Svm diamond shape without mono exclusion #70045
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
